issue.title: [C++] Remove IR Consumer
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-16740](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16740). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
At one point there were two ongoing proposals for serializing exec plans.  An Arrow proposal (ir_consumer) and Substrait.  In general it is perfectly ok to have multiple representations of the exec plan.  So if someone wants the ir_consumer for whatever reason we can keep ti.  However, I believe the ir_consumer representation is no longer being actively maintained / expanded and so we should probably remove it to avoid confusion.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16740?focusedCommentId=17577051) by Weston Pace (westonpace):*
Issue resolved by pull request 13301
